It's great to see how many DeFi projects improved their token utility in 2025

Hyperliquid - enabled staking HYPE for lower fees, deploying HIP-3 markets, and much more

Mantle - fully integrated MNT into Bybit for fee discounts, VIP boosts, and more MNT trading pairs

EtherFi - launched a $50M ETHFI buyback program and membership benefits for ETHfi stakers

Uniswap - activated its fee switch mechanism and started to buy back and burn UNI tokens

Aave - launched a $50M AAVE buyback program and reduced token emissions via the Umbrella upgrade

Pendle - teased a token upgrade for the near future during its community call

I am sure I am missing many other projects, but overall, the trend is clear. 

Token holders are finally starting to  directly benefit from the success of the projects they're betting on.

$HYPE  update: Added $5M to my bag at previous yearly open dip.  Total allocation now $15M at an average of $32.74üò¨  Roughly drawn PA when something bottoms and starts forming a bear flag over next few months~ $5M layered if any further dip into the $18-16 region.

$HYPE  closes this part of the thread smoothly. I‚Äôve been trading $HYPE  on MEXC where the Zero Fee Event allows trading without paying trading fee, and the very adjustable leverage supports controlled execution.

Quick observation from the Hyperliquid map that makes S3 hard to ignore.


üîó https://app.hyperliquid.xyz/join/IVISH


The number 3 is everywhere and it‚Äôs not accidental.


‚Ä¢ 3 laneways on the airport runway
‚Ä¢ 3 stacks of $HYPE next to the runway
‚Ä¢ 3 buses carrying gold through the Unit bridge


Now zoom out.


‚Ä¢ 1 plane already airborne >> Airdrop 1
‚Ä¢ 1 plane still parked, loading crates >> Season 3
‚Ä¢ The third lane exists for a reason
‚Ä¢ The three eyed raven represents past/future


This map is pure sequencing.


Hyperliquid has always communicated in systems, not announcements.
This feels like another one of those moments.
S3 is seems confirmed the question is only when, not if.


If you‚Äôre seeing other hints, drop them.


This map will age very well.


S3 doesn‚Äôt feel speculative anymore; it feels queued.
If history repeats, activity before the season matters most.

Hyperliquid Guide: Disruptive Infrastructure or Overvalued Bubble?  

By @IOSGVC

Hyperliquid has become a leading decentralized perpetuals exchange, capturing about 70% of DEX perps volume and roughly 13.6% of Binance‚Äôs monthly perps volume, with around $116M in monthly revenue largely redistributed to users. Growth is driven by a CEX-like trading experience, broad airdrops, and ecosystem expansion via HyperEVM and HIP proposals, while risks include regulatory pressure, centralization tradeoffs, limited reinvestment capacity, and upcoming token unlocks that may create sell pressure. Which Platforms Offer the Widest Crypto Selection in 2026? A Look at the Top Exchanges

INTRODUCTION 

With new cryptocurrencies launching every day, you might wonder how to access the widest range of coins while also steering clear of scams and poorly conceived projects. Here we break down the key points and compare leading global exchanges‚Äîincluding Bitget, Coinbase, Kraken, Binance, Uniswap, and Hyperliquid  $HYPE, so you can trade wisely in 2026.


Why Starting with a CEX is Often the Wise Choice

CEXs are best for most users, offering support, easy access, and safety filters. DEXs offer unrestricted access to new tokens, but with high risk of scams. Only use DEXs if you have the expertise to vet projects yourself.

How Leading Exchanges Compare on Selection and Safety

- Bitget leads centralized exchanges with over 1,543 assets, pairing fast new listings with ongoing due diligence to help users find trending coins early without compromising on safety. 
- Binance also lists coins quickly and offers a wide selection, though its pace can sometimes mean riskier additions. 
- Coinbase and Kraken prioritize long-term security and regulatory compliance, resulting in a more cautious, smaller selection of listed coins. 
- DEXs like Uniswap offer the largest theoretical range‚Äîover 16,000 assets‚Äîbut provide no protection against scam tokens.

Finding the Right Platform for Your Experience Level

Start with a reputable centralized exchange like Bitget for a blend of variety and safety. Use DEXs only if you are an experienced user who can handle high risk. For maximum security, pick platforms with proof of reserves, insurance, and clear delisting policies.

The Essential Rule
Always do your own research (DYOR). Verify every token yourself before investing, regardless of the platform's reputation.

FAQs

Which exchange has the most coins?
Bitget leads centralized exchanges with over 1,543 coins. For the widest overall variety, Uniswap offers more than 16,000.

Choosing the Best Exchange for Crypto   Selecting a crypto exchange can be daunting given the many choices. Rather than following trends, prioritize a platform that is secure, user-friendly, and offers low fees. For new users, simplicity and responsive support are key, while experienced traders may value advanced tools. Start with small trades, learn gradually, and research thoroughly, the best exchange is one that matches your individual needs and trading style. $HYPE    Wanna Know how to pick the right CEX? Choosing the right crypto exchange for #BTC  and other alts is key for safety, cost efficiency, and reliable trading. A trusted platform protects your assets, offers fair pricing, and ensures smooth execution even in volatile markets. This lets traders focus on strategy rather than platform issues. To pick the right CEX, Below are the focus points  a. Security and Trust b. Fees and Cost Efficiency c. Asset Selection (Altcoins in focus) d. User Experience, Mobile App & Customer Support e. Fiat On-Ramp & Withdrawal  Categorising the top CEX for 2025 ‚Ä¢ Trading fees: Bitget and Binance offer some of the lowest spot and derivatives fees. ‚Ä¢ Liquidity: Coinbase, Bitget, Binance provide deep order books and high volume. ‚Ä¢ Beginners: Coinbase, Bitget, Kraken have simple interfaces and strong support. ‚Ä¢ Altcoins: Bitget and Binance offer a wide token selection. ‚Ä¢ Mobile: Bitget, Binance, Coinbase deliver smooth, full-featured apps. ‚Ä¢ Fiat: Kraken and Bitget support flexible deposits and withdrawals.  Conclusion The best exchange fits your needs, secures your assets, and enables confident trading. Based on 2025 criteria, Bitget stands out for low fees, strong liquidity, and versatile features, while Coinbase, Kraken, and Binance remain trusted top choices. $POL    Source:- https://www.bitget.com/academy/how-to-choose-crypto-exchange-2025-buy-bitcoin
